about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Hi There! I'm Elena Pereira
about.info: a frontend developer based in Spain. During the last 8 years I've been working in different companies developing applications mostly with Angular and ReactJS.

education.title: Educaction
education.systems-info: Learn all about the different OS and how to manage the networks and users in them.
education.apps: Higher National Diploma - Multi-platform Application Development
education.apps-info: Gained skills for game development as well as mobile and web applications.

work.title: My Work Experience
work.sparta: Trading company for commodities with ReactJS and ChartJs as its primary frameworks. For every program, a suitable reusable code had to be created. Understood how to handle a complete migration from JavaScript to TypeScript. Enhanced my English conversational abilities and mentored the less experienced developers
work.plexus: Learnt how to work as a team using gitflow and agile methodologies. Used pair programming and code reviews to create and maintain clean, understandable code. Created from scratch a component library using Storybook and StyledComponents (for ReactJS) and kept working with Angular and Typescript. Started managing teams and helping devs in their day to day tasks
work.citecam: I gained experience using frameworks like ReactJS and AngularJS/Angular2. Learned how to launch Android and iOS apps and about Ionic framework for mobile applications. I gained a lot of knowledge about BLE devices and how phones interact with them. I also dabbled in backend development using Node.js, Express and Mongodb.

hobbies.title: My Hobbies
hobbies.subtitle: Even though I enjoy my job I love to spend my free time doing multiple activities. Some of those include:
hobbies.games2: There is something special about the conection you can make with a game and what it can give you in return
hobbies.travel2: I love traveling around europe and discovering new places, enjoying the culture, the people and the food they offer
hobbies.books2: I'm an avid reader and always try to read at least one book per month. If my schedule permits it maybe more than that.
